name: @ndustrial/nd-theme-react
description: Allows editing assets and their groups
author: ndustrial.io <dev@ndustrial.io> (ndustrial.io)

scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
scripts.package: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel --config-file ../../babel.config.js --extensions '.ts,.tsx,.js' src --out-dir dist --source-maps
